title: BRIEF-General Motors Says CEO Mary Barra's Total 2017 Compensation Was $21.96 Mln
text:
April 27, 2018 / 5:12 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-General Motors Says CEO Mary Barra's Total 2017 Compensation Was $21.96 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - General Motors Co:
* GENERAL MOTORS CO SAYS CEO MARY BARRA’S TOTAL 2017 COMPENSATION WAS $21.96 MILLION VERSUS $22.58 MILLION IN 2016
* GENERAL MOTORS SAYS CFO CHARLES STEVENS’ TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $7.1 MILLION VERSUS $7.6 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING
* GENERAL MOTORS SAYS PRESIDENT DANIEL AMMANN'S TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $9.3 MILLION VERSUS $10.2 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2r3FrHg ) Further company coverage:
